title: WTB: T206 Lenox and Uzit backs

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Lenox and Uzit backs
posts.post_content:
Hey all,

I'm looking to buy a T206 with either a Lenox or Uzit back. Preferably without paper loss. Have about $700 on hand from recent sales so if you have an example and that price or lower works for you please get in touch.

e-mail: [url]rare_baseballstuff@yahoo.com[/url]
